title: Siriously Substantial Slabs
content: Dear slab-serif loving peoples of Typophile: What are your favorite slabs? Obscure or traditional; which ones out there do you use, or feel are unique?
author: brockfrench

comments.content: H\_FJ just twittered this one out: [http://archeralert.wordpress.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021031221/http:/archeralert.wordpress.com/ "http://archeralert.wordpress.com/")

A long search for my ideal humanist slab led me to Sumner Stone's [Silica](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021031221/http:/stonetypefoundry.com/silicaoverview.html). I only wish it had italics (though Magma's italics, Sumner mentioned in an e-mail, work nicely as a substitute).

Silica is great.

PMN Caecilia is extensive - wow.
